title: The Billionaires' Executive Sweet: The Complete Series
description: Exotic travel, expensive clothes, hot sex with five billionaires... who needs love?I couldn't decide which was worse, my lackluster sex life or my low-paying job.But after a chance meeting with a wealthy businessman who promised to change my life, I'm forced to choose between my old status quo and a new mysterious life as a playmate for five alpha billionaire executives—a job guaranteed to lead me into some exciting, unimaginably hot, and occasionally reckless situations.Ready or not, this is my new life.In The Billionaires' Executive Sweet, 26-year-old Chicago travel blogger Chelsea meets a mysterious man who vanishes immediately after talking her into a decidedly risky encounter. Later he reappears and takes Chelsea to a meeting with four of his billionaire friends, all alpha males, who have a proposal for They need a companion to accompany them on their occasional deviant sexual escapades, someone who is beautiful, adventurous, and open-minded. And they're willing to pay an absurd amount of money for this short-term position. Chelsea is forced to decide on the spot, with the course of her life hanging in the balance. She soon finds herself doing things the likes of which she'd never imagined herself capable—the most dangerous being falling in love with a man she can't possibly have.The Billionaires' Executive Sweet is an absolute thrill-ride of an erotic romance that leads to a conclusion with a completely unexpected HEA.
author: Alexis Adaire
